long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Privo is the easiest way to take hold of your privacy and combat nosy people, no matter where you are.

It takes a screen-stalker less than 1 second to destroy your privacy, and know exactly what you are currently doing on the internet.

ğŸ¤• Problem is, this can have HUGE implications on you depending on where you are.

Take for example workplace ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ’»

People have a tendency to generalize. It takes a work-colleague of yours a couple of times to see you browsing a non-work-related article, checking Reddit, or Facebook to describe you as a "slacker".

ğŸ‘¨â€âœˆï¸ In dictatorships, people can lose their jobs or even go to jail because they were seen browsing an article on a website that opposes the ruling government.

The same could happen to news reporters.


Privo is here to fix that. ğŸ’ª

Privo wraps the content you want to consume in another website (that you also pick) so that you can do what you want while giving the stalker what they want to see.


Just as a VPN makes you seem as if you were browsing the internet from another country, Privo makes you seem as if you were browsing a different website that you picked beforehand (we call these â€œtemplatesâ€).

It is your new VPN on the browser-level. ğŸŒ


How to use Privo?

Open a webpage or an article (letâ€™s say a CNN article).
Select some text on the page, then double click on â€œmouse middle clickâ€, or right-click then select â€œGo Privoâ€.
And voila! Your article is now wrapped within one of your safe websites (templates).
